price: Na tumefika kwako kwa Haki, na hakika sisi tunasema kweli.
footnotes: Nasi tumekujia kwa amri iliyo thaabiti isiyo na shaka, nayo ni kuiteremsha adhabu. Na kutimiza ahadi ni katika sifa yetu, kwa amri ya Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: And we have come to you
